comment.body:
The following rule works but only for one page.

nypost.com###jw-player-SPdDOYds-W5xXwQyA > div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset.jw-float-to-top:nth-child(2)

https://nypost.com/2024/11/17/us-news/nyc-da-alvin-bragg-favored-to-win-re-election-new-yorkers-are-crazy/

I think a rule blocking only div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset.jw-float-to-top will work on all pages.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/184282

comment.body:
> Made an account so I could respond to my own issue. After some research, I installed AdGuard for Safari and turned off AdGuard for MacOS in Safari and everything works. Since both versions have the same icon, I'd rather not have to keep both on my computer (but sometimes use browsers other than Safari), so I have a new question: are there settings – in either AdGuard or Safari - that I can change so that the App will work as well as the Extension does?

Also can confirm, if I uninstall the full Adgaurd for Mac (paid) and then just use the safari extension (free) this issue goes away. So there is something happening at DNS level that's blocking this as the safari extension (as I understand) doesn't have this feature

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7nightly 12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://microdown.myapp.com/ug/%E5%BA%94%E7%94%A8%E5%AE%9D.apk?comment=channelId%3D1181533%26context%3D%26scheme%3Dtmast%253A%252F%252Fencrypt%253Fencryptdata%253DfmhmhLuSWogrncDRTHUyILpdoRnnCP5xLYXW5WKcPc5lVDtwDloAK2D3Ekf35J167k3jA2fM7H66mvt%25252FGbFaNnGhGW3s6vH6Mz5M2vnzgBXMF5A6SEdzZDK9NJ6GnoKgc1ansy29ahGdUdW%25252FULFTBzdo3KKt8ey3Ksxib5WyHRpqeF9dWlnZgOcENdBkmqvJwZgAsXUSF0IX8vxUdHX5Iy9IRAY0wPnnxcOZpPVZyfghq5Hc9jKEYjbXA%25252FUAavtrfXs56kGjaPzd0%25252B2c7ts9YqBYhFk2G%25252Bc3vtA2X1TiBe3jn2o1op4R%25252FlCmKcbE2%25252Bpe73dFkz4BHnla1YZ6VNDUpeTQ0uZq65ll0QVATBlXaPJ2BfZYj7KMeVn2vvyHnAh0%25252BRgAQYuxaYRmzg7v%25252BDHAZC%25252F6d%25252BfBCGVCIHTsII43HJBAzDBoUSTqkVT5bbosRKVXwDhZm23pRC647rGqSag3YmT0X5pJpzgd%25252BgQqJkfZv7ef8qsxN%25252BVmjEE8cXvfl7Q77ekJuG2dH8sGX4K5RG8emgM62aWq5NYI0ZbYVi03cmyIHoc9BW2ZN7wUbv4YrsRvtW1evLa6ozobelRo4Fo2ugJE0QmYD8ofxPQmHfo3txY7DXfJAO%25252Bt0T732zLofBMVL3wReHuf7yQ7ZHk3fojWk4ME3kBhWPPkv6FoRdTEO5cro4%25252FwKjM3dgchoYrQ7i4AVuMMghlnPSA%25252BK%25252BFwpqqjGVyVExuukmAwEI4m2ZbvcjvHOaawzVrRCpKSXAvQLPSGJwG9DRkO%25252FXKUMXYovoUt8A%25253D%25253D%2526start_time%253D1731921781297%2526expiry_time%253D1731925381297%26t%3D1731921781000%26signature%3DmyLU7qEidnoCKWXnXa9BQvpM5GrLiw9JugoSVAHfIyz1lIkLVHFqaSmQ3LBzskhocvhzbvEzxSRti92qterEzp6Tk2XpYDGdU4StBlvcvYvuJZov7IXrANX%252BJKiY6riKi4YM0tmMAhTp9PDBwvB9YHl6ktx6i6h5ZRogMq2WS%252BE%253D&sign_type=V2&realname=20241113_8c221b1a125296ff8dc22e649eb38304_offset_30466048

上面的链接是一个叫做“智行火车票”的软件的下载链接，m.ctrip.com是这个软件的广告域名，每当启动这个软件时就会出现长达3秒的广告，如果禁止这个域名，广告就会消失，并且基本功能不受影响。

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Hm, could you translate that window and also take a look at the requests in `Recent activity`? You can get there by clicking on the `Assistant` in the AdGuard notification window - choose the app - Recent activity.
> There may be a suspicious request blocking which will help prevent this window from appearing. Please send the screenshots of them here and try to block them manually.
> If there's no effect, it's probably built into the app.

你说的翻译是指翻译我刚刚发的图片吗？这个图片圈起来的“广告”这个词的意思就是advertising。内容是抢1000元的机票补贴，总之就是广告了。第二第三张图就是启动软件时产生的请求。第一个请求就是我要你们禁止的域名
![Screenshot_20241118_183355_com.yipiao_edit_326313493412186.jpg](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f7eae6de-4387-4b77-b005-4f5813d7b61d)

comment.body:
Hm, could you translate that window and also take a look at the requests in `Recent activity`? You can get there by clicking on the `Assistant` in the AdGuard notification window - choose the app - Recent activity.
There may be a suspicious request blocking which will help prevent this window from appearing. Please send the screenshots of them here and try to block them manually.
If there's no effect, it's probably built into the app.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.sooplive.co.kr/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sooplive.co.kr%2F) ### Comment > https://www.sooplive.co.kr/ > 라이브 스트리밍 플랫폼인데 모든 방송이 애드가드 사용시 접속에 15초 이상 걸림. 문제 보고에 대해 애드가드측에서는 문제가 해결되었다고 연락을 했으나, 전혀 개선되지 않음. > 가능한 한 빨리 해결되었으면 함. > > > It's a live streaming platform, and all broadcasts take more than 15 seconds to access when using AdGuard. Regarding the problem report I sent you last time, AdGuard contacted me that the problem was solved, but nothing improved at all. I hope to improve as soon as possible > > Username: `@ㅁ` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7nightly 12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

```adblock
||m.ctrip.com^$app=com.tencent.android.qqdownloader|com.yipiao
```
